movies.Actors: Peter Weller, Nancy Allen, Dan O'Herlihy, Ronny Cox
movies.Plot: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 11 wins & 10 nominations.

movies.Title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
movies.Writer: Rick Jaffa, Amanda Silver
movies.Actors: Andy Serkis, Karin Konoval, Terry Notary, Richard Ridings
movies.Plot: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives advanced intelligence to a chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 21 wins & 42 nominations.

movies.Title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
movies.Writer: Ehren Kruger
movies.Actors: Shia LaBeouf, Rosie Huntington-Whiteley, Josh Duhamel, John Turturro
movies.Plot: The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and to learn its secrets.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 10 wins & 39 nominations.

movies.Title: A Clockwork Orange
movies.Writer: Stanley Kubrick (screenplay), Anthony Burgess (novel)
movies.Actors: Malcolm McDowell, Patrick Magee, Michael Bates, Warren Clarke
movies.Plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.
movies.Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 9 wins & 19 nominations.

movies.Title: Alphaville
movies.Writer: Jean-Luc Godard
movies.Actors: Eddie Constantine, Anna Karina, Akim Tamiroff
movies.Plot: A U.S. secret agent is sent to the distant space city of Alphaville where he must find a missing person and free the city from its tyrannical ruler.

movies.Title: The Fly
movies.Writer: George Langelaan (short story), Charles Edward Pogue (screenplay), David Cronenberg (screenplay)
movies.Actors: Jeff Goldblum, Geena Davis, John Getz, Joy Boushel
movies.Plot: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

movies.Title: Inception
movies.Writer: Christopher Nolan
movies.Actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Tom Hardy
movies.Plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

movies.Title: Men in Black
movies.Writer: Lowell Cunningham (comic), Ed Solomon (screen story), Ed Solomon (screenplay)
movies.Actors: Tommy Lee Jones, Will Smith, Linda Fiorentino, Vincent D'Onofrio
movies.Plot: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

movies.Title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
movies.Writer: James Cameron, William Wisher
movies.Actors: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Edward Furlong, Robert Patrick
movies.Plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

movies.Title: Ghost in the Shell
movies.Writer: Shirow Masamune (based on the comic "The Ghost in the Shell" by), Jamie Moss (screenplay by), William Wheeler (screenplay by), Ehren Kruger (screenplay by)
movies.Actors: Scarlett Johansson, Pilou Asbæk, Takeshi Kitano, Juliette Binoche
movies.Plot: In the near future, Major Mila Killian is the first of her kind: A human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals.

movies.Title: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
movies.Writer: W.D. Richter (screenplay), Jack Finney (novel)
movies.Actors: Donald Sutherland, Brooke Adams, Jeff Goldblum, Veronica Cartwright
movies.Plot: In San Francisco, a group of people discover the human race is being replaced one by one, with clones devoid of emotion.

movies.Title: Children of Men
movies.Writer: Alfonso Cuarón (screenplay), Timothy J. Sexton (screenplay), David Arata (screenplay), Mark Fergus (screenplay), Hawk Ostby (screenplay), P.D. James (novel)
movies.Actors: Clive Owen, Juan Gabriel Yacuzzi, Michael Caine, Mishal Husain
movies.Plot: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have become somehow infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.
movies.Language: English, German, Italian, Romanian, Spanish, Arabic, Georgian, Russian, Serbian
movies.Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 48 wins & 76 nominations.

movies.Title: Ex Machina
movies.Writer: Alex Garland
movies.Actors: Domhnall Gleeson, Alicia Vikander, Oscar Isaac, Sonoya Mizuno
movies.Plot: A young programmer is selected to participate in a ground-breaking experiment in synthetic intelligence by evaluating the human qualities of a breath-taking humanoid A.I.

movies.Title: Solaris
movies.Writer: Stanislaw Lem (novel), Steven Soderbergh (screenplay)
movies.Actors: George Clooney, Natascha McElhone, Viola Davis, Jeremy Davies
movies.Plot: A troubled psychologist is sent to investigate the crew of an isolated research station orbiting a bizarre planet.

movies.Title: Back to the Future
movies.Writer: Robert Zemeckis, Bob Gale
movies.Actors: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson, Crispin Glover
movies.Plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

movies.Title: Jurassic Park
movies.Writer: Michael Crichton (novel), Michael Crichton (screenplay), David Koepp (screenplay)
movies.Actors: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum, Richard Attenborough
movies.Plot: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

movies.Title: Her
movies.Writer: Spike Jonze
movies.Actors: Joaquin Phoenix, Lynn Adrianna, Lisa Renee Pitts, Gabe Gomez
movies.Plot: In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

movies.Title: Star Trek
movies.Writer: Roberto Orci, Alex Kurtzman, Gene Roddenberry (television series "Star Trek")
movies.Actors: Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Leonard Nimoy, Eric Bana
movies.Plot: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful Romulan from the future creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.
